# PasteBox

> A modern pastebin service for sharing code snippets with syntax highlighting.

## Overview

PasteBox is a full-stack web application that allows users to create, share, and manage code snippets. Built with React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Redis.

## Key Features

- Syntax highlighting for 25+ programming languages
- Custom expiration times (1-24 hours, 1-7 days, 1 week)
- View count analytics
- Raw/plain text endpoint for programmatic access
- Redis caching for fast retrieval
- MongoDB TTL indexes for automatic cleanup
- Docker support for easy deployment

## Tech Stack

- Frontend: React 18, TailwindCSS, React Syntax Highlighter
- Backend: Node.js 18+, Express 4.21
- Database: MongoDB 8 with TTL indexes
- Cache: Redis 7 (optional)
- Containerization: Docker, docker-compose

## API Endpoints

- POST /api/pastes - Create a new paste
- GET /api/pastes/:id - Get paste by ID
- GET /api/pastes/:id/raw - Get raw paste content
- GET /api/pastes/:id/analytics - Get paste view statistics
- DELETE /api/pastes/:id - Delete a paste
- GET /api/pastes/search?q=query - Search pastes
- GET /health - Health check

## Repository Structure

- /client - React frontend
- /server - Express backend
- /scripts - Utility scripts (bash, python, typescript)
- /docker-compose.yml - Full stack deployment
